member.name: NMITEMACTIVATE
member.summary: Contains information about an LVN_ITEMACTIVATE notification code.

member.name: NMITEMACTIVATE.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains information about this notification code.

member.name: NMITEMACTIVATE.iItem
member.summary: Index of the list-view item. If the item index is not used for the notification, this member will contain -1.

member.name: NMITEMACTIVATE.iSubItem
member.summary: One-based index of the subitem. If the subitem index is not used for the notification or the notification does not apply to a subitem, this member will contain zero.

member.name: NMITEMACTIVATE.uNewState
member.summary: New item state. This member is zero for notification codes that do not use it.

member.name: NMITEMACTIVATE.uOldState
member.summary: Old item state. This member is zero for notification codes that do not use it.

member.name: NMITEMACTIVATE.uChanged
member.summary: Set of flags that indicate the item attributes that have changed. This member is zero for notifications that do not use it. Otherwise, it can have the same values as themask member of the structure.

member.name: NMITEMACTIVATE.ptAction
member.summary: structure that indicates the location at which the event occurred, in client coordinates. This member is undefined for notification codes that do not use it.

member.name: NMITEMACTIVATE.lParam
member.summary: Application-defined value of the item. This member is undefined for notification codes that do not use it.
